attributes.action: Make it illegal to smoke in cars with children
attributes.additional_details: Smoking in bars and restaurants has been banned due to the associated health problems this could present to non smokers.  But yet, parents and guardians are allowed to smoke in an even more confined space, a car, with kids present.  This is bordering on child cruelty, and must be outlawed ASAP.  Please sign and pass on to as many people as possible to make children safer and healthier
